Title: Right Side of Illuminated Double-page Incipit
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.575 is the right side of an illuminated double-page incipit. It is inscribed with the name of chapter 1 (Surat al-fatihah) and the phrase: la yamassuhu ill√° al-mutahharun (only the ritually pure should touch it).
Keywords: Arabic; Codex; Illumination; Iran; IslKoran; Qur`an; Arabic; Islamic; Qajar; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Manuscript; Iran
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
